name: Overview

It provides a hierarchical framework for traversing Python Abstract Syntax Trees (AST) and transforming raw source code into a structured semantic model.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9bddabe2-f1ec-4a10-a846-60c5a4fc2fe4","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"By separating foundational traversal mechanics from advanced semantic analysis, this folder enables a robust and extensible approach to understanding Python code behavior, data flow, and module relationships.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e9b9d9bb-64ea-473f-9f8a-34ba448d8da2","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Components","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f22d0c53-f374-4325-8726-7317de229052","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"base","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0ce49dbd-d111-47a3-b98c-4f29726b2195","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"base","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" module defines the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ProcessingBase","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class, which serves as the fundamental building block for all analysis tasks. It acts as the \"orchestrator\" of the AST visitation process, managing the heavy lifting of:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"995cd2e0-6684-4759-a668-fb7532eb8074","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"State Maintenance:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Managing the call stack and name stacks to track the analyzer's current position.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"524070ba-6c25-4209-8290-c96ec59705e9","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Namespace Management:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Generating fully qualified names for every variable, function, and class.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0d72a182-5252-4297-a432-2aef8a22f6f1","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Contextual Traversal:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Providing standardized logic for visiting standard Python constructs like loops, conditionals, and assignments.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d413fafe-1326-4a06-b4ab-01b9e222def1","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"extProcessor","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9f40e127-790e-4140-9558-9ccd4764d388","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"extProcessor","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" module extends the foundation provided by the base class to perform advanced semantic analysis. It houses the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ExtProcessor","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class, which is responsible for:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f7f2ae2b-f7af-4436-b6e1-f44bdc32e4be","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Semantic Intelligence:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Resolving complex variable references and \"points-to\" relationships across different files.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"42b884af-d81f-4e19-9bbd-2e0d7df23724","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Path-Sensitive Analysis:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Tracking how variable states change and merge across different execution paths (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if/else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" blocks).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"03e96392-687d-48ef-862c-e994b8e414d7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Dependency Mapping:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Constructing call graphs and inheritance hierarchies to visualize the architecture of the analyzed codebase.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1f95ca28-e8f7-47b0-a9de-2b38982ae515","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Manager Coordination:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Integrating deeply with specialized managers (Import, Scope, Definition) to build a persistent database of project information.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"833f83db-f2a2-4d81-977e-53d510fa1163","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage in the Framework","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8a5e3605-27b0-4595-8a70-255cb369cab7","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"processing","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" folder effectively acts as the \"visitor\" layer of the application. High-level drivers initialize these processors with a set of managers and a target file. The processors then recursively \"walk\" through the code, populating the managers with the discovered structural and semantic data.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bd206db1-7a1b-4eb1-8fc9-a5aed87953a2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
